name: tm51
effect: Teaches Roost to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ally Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Roost)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
